attributes.action: Get FIFA to stop all the diving/cheating in football. It's ruining our game.
attributes.additional_details:
Let's get our government to put pressure on FIFA.  They can at least discuss it. 
IT HAS TO STOP.
attributes.background:
For far too long football players have gotten away with cheating. Ie. Diving.
We all can see it on our screens. And  sure the reff knows they do it, but the reffs are powerless to do anything about it.
FIFA needs to step in and make is a sending off offence.
